Captain.Title: Barak
Captain.Ability: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes, you may discard the Photon Torpedoes Upgrade to gain +1 attack die for that attack.

Captain.Title: Vrax
Captain.Ability: You may deploy the "Reman Bodyguards" Upgrade to your ship at a cost of -2 SP, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

Captain.Title: Matt Decker
Captain.Ability: If this card is assigned to a Federation ship, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may disable this card to gain +1 attack die for that attack. If you ship is destroyed, you may immediately target a friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship. If you do so, discard the Captain Card from the target ship. This card becomes the new Captain Card for that ship.
